attributes.action: Pass a law which makes it illegal ...
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
to pay ANY bonus by ANY organisation or company which makes a loss in that finacial year.
Employee's should NOT be rewarded for failure and for a company already losing money, to add to the debt by paying a bonus is lunacy!

rejection.details: Please rephrase your title to make it clear what your petition is about. Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
